entry.title: [CW] I'm not a parent and don't plan to become one, but I'm curious. Should American
entry.content: I'm not a parent and don't plan to become one, but I'm curious. Should American parents be more concerned than they are about the US Pledge of Allegiance? Wouldn't it be simple to "inoculate" a child against it by having them take a counter-pledge in advance that negates it?
